properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Buttahatchie River...Obion River...Right Hand Chute Little River...
S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Saint Francis River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale
* from Monday January 13 until further notice.
* At 09 AM Friday the stage was...3.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 12.0 feet on Tuesday January 14.
* Flood stage is 11.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Monday January 13 and
continue to rise to near 12.0 feet by Tuesday January 14.
At 12.0 feet, Evacuations may be necessary for some areas inside the
main levee system due to access problems. Field flooding is
widespread..
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
